Source: Autorky studie v odůvodnění rozsudků nezřídka narážely  na relativizaci traumatu obětí či omlouvání pachatelů. „Obžalovaný je jedincem, který se do současné doby neprojevoval protispolečensky, není takto disponován, a proto u něj do budoucnosti znalkyně považuje protispolečenské jevy za málo pravděpodobné,“ stojí například v jednom z rozsudků nad mužem, který znásilňoval svou pětiletou neteř. Od soudu odešel s tříletým podmíněným trestem, ačkoliv trestní sazba pro tento čin je pět až patnáct let. Socioložky uvádějí, že soudci v rozsudcích zlehčují či popírají dopad znásilnění na oběti. Soudci i znalci nezřídka konstatovali, že „poškozená trauma nemá“. Domnělá absence psychických následků se pak promítala do zdůvodnění nižšího trestu. „Ze studií přitom vyplývá, že nějakou míru psychických následků má naprostá většina obětí znásilnění,“ dodávají autorky.
English translation: The authors of the study often found relativization of the trauma of the victims or the apology of the perpetrators in the justification of the sentences. "The defendant is an individual who has not exhibited antisocial behavior to date, he is not so disposed, and therefore the expert considers antisocial behaviour unlikely in his future," reads, for example, one of the sentences for a man who raped his five-year-old niece. He walked out of court with a three-year suspended sentence, although the penalty for this offense is 5 to 15 years. Sociologists report that judges downplay or deny the impact of rape on victims in their sentences. Judges and experts have often stated that "the victim is not traumatized." The supposed absence of psychological effects was then reflected in the justification for a lower sentence. "Yet studies show that the vast majority of rape victims experience some degree of psychological consequences," the authors add.

Source: "Rechtsstaatlichkeit und Menschenrechte sind weltweit so bedroht wie seit Jahrzehnten nicht mehr", zieht Amnesty International Bilanz. Im Vorwort des Berichts spricht Agnès Callamard, die Internationale Generalsekretärin der NGO, sogar von deutlichen Rückschritten bei der Wahrung von Menschenrechten. Der Stand der Menschen, die in Demokratien leben, sei weltweit auf den Stand von 1985 zurückgegangen. Als Demokratie zählen dabei Länder, die rechtsstaatliche Prinzipien einhalten, etwa die Trennung von Exekutive, Judikative und Legislative und in denen bürgerliche Grundrechte gewahrt werden. 1985 - "das ist die Zeit vor der Entlassung Nelson Mandelas aus dem Gefängnis, vor dem Fall der Berliner Mauer, vor dem Ende des Kalten Krieges und vor all den damit verbundenen Hoffnungen auf eine neue Ära für die Menschheit", schreibt Callamard.
English translation: "The rule of law and human rights are under greater threat worldwide than they have been for decades," summarises Amnesty International. In the foreword to the report, Agnès Callamard, the NGO's International Secretary General, even speaks of significant regression in the protection of human rights. The number of people living in democracies worldwide has fallen back to 1985 levels. Countries that adhere to the principles of the rule of law, such as the separation of the executive, judiciary, and legislature, and in which fundamental civil rights are upheld, count as democracies. 1985 - "This is the time before Nelson Mandela was released from prison, before the fall of the Berlin Wall, before the end of the Cold War, and before all the associated hopes for a new era for humanity," writes Callamard.

Source: Bajki su stawiznički zboža, kotrež maja swoje wuchadźišćo w njezbožu. Dźěsću wumrěje mać, bratřa so do ptačkow přeměnja a kralowske dźowki so wot zmija rubja. Bajki powědaja přikładnje wo mylenju wobstejaceho porjada a wo přewinjenju tuteje krizy. W popularnym powědanju zawinujetej so zničenje a wobnowjenje mjez sobu: Ze zbytkow morjenych rostu pomocliwe rostliny, rozkuskowane wopory wotuća z pomocu magiskich objektow k nowemu žiwjenju, ludźo w zwěrjećej postawje so přez namóc wumóža. Mnohe motiwy wosudnych powědančkow wotbłyšćuja nazhonjenja ludźi z přirodu, kotraž so prawidłownje sama wobnowi, ale tež jich přeće za wustrowjenjom, womłodźenjom a přewinjenjom smjerće.
English translation: Fairy tales are stories of happiness that have their starting point in misfortune. The child's mother dies, the brothers turn into birds, and royal daughters are stolen by the dragon. Fairy tales exemplify a disruption of the existing order and the overcoming of this crisis. In popular storytelling, destruction and renewal cause each other: helpful plants grow from the remains of those killed, dismembered victims awaken to new life with the help of magical objects, people in animal form are redeemed by violence. Many motifs of fateful tales reflect people's experiences with nature, which regularly renews itself, but also their desire for recovery, eldering and overcoming death.

Source: Tha Bòrd na Gàidhlig a’ ruith seiseanan trèanaidh Gàidhlig do luchd Pròbhaidh am-bliadhna! Thèid 4 seiseanan a lìbhrigeadh agus thèid an dàrna seisean a ruith air Diciadain, 28.02.24 bho 4.15f gu 5.15f air-loidhne, air Microsoft Teams. Chan fheum cunntas Teams a bhith agaibh airson an seisean a fhrithealadh. Thèid fòcus a dhèanamh air Stòrlann agus tha sinn toilichte gum bi luchd-obrach Stòrlann ann airson bruidhinn ribh mu na diofar ghoireasan a th’ aca aig ìre bun-sgoil agus aig ìre àrd-sgoil. Bidh fàilte bhlàth oirbh tighinn airson èisteachd is bruidhinn riutha agus ’s e deagh chothrom do luchd-phròbhaidh ceanglaichean a dhèanamh le tidsearan ùra eile far Alba. Cha deach co-dhùnadh a dhèanamh mu na cinn-latha airson an dà sheisean a tha ri thighinn fhathast, ach bidh fòcas agus cothroman ionnsachaidh eadar-dhealaichte aig gach fear. Chan fheum sibh a bhith air a’ chiad sheisean a fhrithealadh gus an seisean seo no an dà sheisean ri thighinn a fhrithealadh.
English translation: Bòrd na Gàidhlig are running training sessions for Gaelic probationery Teachers this year! There will be 4 sessions running and the first one will run on Wednesday, 28.02.24 from 4:15pm to 5:15pm on Microsoft Teams. You don’t need to have a Teams account to attend the session. We are going to be focusing on Stòrlann and are very happy that Stòrlann staff will be joining us to talk about the resources the have at both primary school and high school level. You are most welcome to join us to talk and listen and it will be a great opportunity for probationers to network with other new teachers accross Scotland. The dates for the two remaining sessions are still to be confirmed, but they will each have a diffrent focus. You do not need to have attended the first session to attend this session or the remaining two sessions.

Source:
Ríonnann an tealaíontóir, Isbéal Nic Aoidh, an dualgas a bhíonn ar na Comhlacha Cruthaitheach.
"Is clár dhá bhliana atá i gceist agus an ról atá againne ná na healaíona agus an chruthaitheacht a chur chun cinn sa scoil agus go mbeadh sé mar croílár shaoil na ndaoine óga. Tá guth na ndaoine óga ana-thábhachtach sa phróiséis. Tá trí chuid sa chlár; breathnaíonn muid ar na gníomhaíochtaí atá ar bun acu cheanna féin go cruthaítheach sa scoil, taobh amuigh den scoil agus sa mbaile. Bímid ag obair leis na leanaí ansin; cruthaíonn muid coiste leis na leanaí, tagann siadsan suas le smaointe agus déanaimid go leor ceardlanna ar an gcruthaíocht. Uaidh sin tagann muid suas le creat pleanála agus sa dara bhliain ansin cuirimid an plean sin i gcrích. Tagann ealíontóirí gairmiúla isteach ansin sa dara bliain."
English translation: The artist, Isbéal Nic Aïh, manages the duties of the Creative Associates. "It is a two-year program and our role is to promote the arts and creativity in the school and make it the center of young people's lives. The voice of young people is very important in the process. The program has three parts; we look at the activities they are doing creatively in the school, outside the school and in the town. We work with the children there; we create a committee with the children, they come up with ideas and we do many workshops on creativity. From that we come up with a planning framework and in the second year then we complete that plan. Professional artists then join in the second year."

Source:
La 44-a Universala Kongreso de Esperanto okazis en Varsovio inter la 1-a kaj la 8-a de aŭgusto 1959. Koincide, Richard Nixon estis en Varsovio por kvartaga oficiala vizito inter la 2-a kaj la 6-a de aŭgusto. Tiutempe, Nixon estis vic-prezidanto de Usono, kaj lia vizito al Pollando (kaj, poste, al Sovetunio) estis grava, ĉar estis klopodo re-alproksimigi la ”Unuan” kaj la ”Duan” Mondojn, post jaroj da konfliktoj kaj malkonsentoj ĉiuspecaj.
La formalaj rendevuoj dum lia vizito inkluzivis plurajn kunsidojn kun membroj de la Komunista Partio kaj publikajn elmontrojn de amikeco inter la kapitalisma kaj komunisma blokoj.
English translation: The 44th Universal Congress of Esperanto took place in Warsaw between August 1 and 8, 1959. Coincidentally, Richard Nixon was in Warsaw for a four-day official visit between August 2 and 6. At the time, Nixon was vice-president of the United States, and his visit to Poland (and, later, to the Soviet Union) was important, because it was an effort to re-approach the "First" and the "Second" Worlds, after years of conflicts and disagreements of all kinds. The formal appointments during his visit included several meetings with members of the Communist Party and public displays of friendship between the capitalist and communist blocs.

Source: ᓄᓇᕕᐅᑉ ᑭᒡᒐᖅᑐᐃᔨᖓ ᑲᓇᑕᐅᑉ ᒪᓕᒐᓕᐅᖅᑎᖏᓐᓂ ᖃᐃᖁᔨᓂᖃᖅᐳᖅ ᒐᕙᒪᑐᖃᒃᑯᓐᓂ “ᐃᓚᐅᑎᑦᑎᙱᓐᓂᐅᔪᒥ” ᐃᒡᓗᖃᖅᑎᑦᑎᓂᕐᒧᑦ ᖄᖏᖅᓯᒪᔪᓂ ᐊᕐᕌᒍᓂ 30−ᓂ. ᐊᑏᐱ—Baie-James—ᓄᓇᕕᒃ—ᐄᔫ ᑲᓇᑕᐅᑉ ᒪᓕᒐᓕᐅᖅᑎᖏᓐᓂ ᐃᓚᒋᔭᐅᔪᖅ ᓯᐅᓪᕕ ᐱᕉᑉ ᐅᖃᓚᐅᖅᐳᖅ “ᐱᓪᓚᕆᐅᕗᖅ” ᑐᑭᓯᐅᒪᓂᕐᒥ ᐃᒡᓗᓂ ᖃᓄᐃᓕᖓᓂᖏᓐᓂ ᐅᖓᓯᒃᑐᒥ ᓄᓇᓕᐅᔪᓂ ᐊᔾᔨᒋᙱᓐᓂᖏᓐᓂ ᐊᒥᐊᒃᑯᖓᓂ ᑯᐸᐃᖕᒥ, ᑐᓴᒐᒃᓴᓕᐊᖑᔪᒥ ᐊᐃᑉᕆᓕ 10−ᒥ. ᐸᓛᒃ ᑯᐸᑯᐊᒃᑯᑦ ᑲᓇᑕᐅᑉ ᒪᓕᒐᓕᐅᖅᑎᖏᓐᓂ ᐃᓚᒋᔭᐅᔪᖅ ᖃᐃᖁᔨᓂᖃᓚᐅᖅᐳᖅ “ᓇᓗᓇᐃᖅᑕᐅᓯᒪᔪᓂ ᐊᒻᒪ ᓱᖏᐅᔾᔭᐅᓯᒪᓂᖏᓐᓂ” ᐋᖅᑭᒍᑎᒃᓴᓂ ᓄᓇᕕᖕᒧᑦ, ᐃᓚᒋᐊᖅᓯᓪᓗᓂ ᐅᓄᕐᓂᖅᓴᐅᔪᒥ ᐊᑕᐅᓯᕐᒥ−ᐱᖓᓱᓂ ᐊᕕᒃᑐᖅᓯᒪᓂᐅᔫᑉ ᐃᓄᒋᐊᖕᓂᖏᓐᓂ ᐃᒡᓗᖃᖅᐳᑦ ᐸᖕᒥᐅᓗᐊᖅᑐᓂ ᐃᒡᓗᓂᑦ.
English translation: Nunavik’s representative in Parliament is calling out the federal government for its “disengagement” on housing over the past 30 years. Abitibi—Baie-James—Nunavik—Eeyou MP Sylvie Bérubé said it’s “crucial” to understand that housing conditions in remote communities are not the same as the rest of Quebec, in a news release Wednesday. The Bloc Québécois MP called for “specific and adapted” solutions for Nunavik, adding that more than one-third of the region’s population lives in overcrowded housing.
If original, then MT:: The MP has called on the federal government to exclusive" housing in the past 30 years. Atiibi—Baie-James—Yahoo MP Sylvie Prairie said it is "important" to understand the housing situation in remote communities in different parts of Quebec, in a press release on April 10. Black Quebec's MPs invited "special and adaptable" solutions to Nunavik, adding that more than one-third of the region's population live in overcrowded housing.

Source: Навіть ті, хто не надто стежить за політичними течіями у США і не знає імен американських конгресменів, за останній тиждень не могли не чути про Марджорі Тейлор Грін або принаймні про її ініціативи щодо України. Саме ця американська конгресменка подала низку найодіозніших (а якщо говорити прямо – то ідіотських) правок до закону про американську допомогу Україні. Наприклад, вона запропонувала додати до бюджетного закону США норму про те, що кожен конгресмен, хто підтримає допомогу Україні, має бути мобілізований до ЗСУ. "Якщо ви хочете фінансувати війну, чому б вам не воювати в ній", – пояснила свою логіку депутатка.
English translation: Even if you don't follow US politics closely and don't know the names of American Congressmen, you could hardly have missed hearing about Marjorie Taylor Greene – or at least her initiatives regarding Ukraine – over the past week. The American Congresswoman put forward a series of the most abhorrent (and, let's be honest, idiotic) amendments to the Ukraine aid bill. She proposed, for example, that any member of the House of Representatives who voted for the Ukraine aid bill should be required to conscript into the Ukrainian military. "If you want to fund endless foreign wars, you should have to go fight them," the lawmaker explained.
If original, then MT:: Even those who do not follow the political currents in the United States and do not know the names of American congressmen over the past week could not help but hear about Marjorie Taylor Greene, or at least about her initiatives regarding Ukraine. It was this American congresswoman who submitted a number of the most odious (and, to put it bluntly, idiotic) amendments to the law on American aid to Ukraine. For example, she proposed to add a provision to the US budget law that every congressman who supports assistance to Ukraine must be mobilized to the Armed Forces of Ukraine. "If you want to finance the war, why don't you fight in it," the deputy explained her logic.

Source: Wakilan kasashen duniya na taro a Canada karo na hudu domin shawo kan matsalar gurɓatar yanayi da robobi da leda ke haifarwa. A wajen taron da suka gudanar a sheakarar 2021 ne ƙasashen suka amince cewa za su cimma matsaya zuwa karshen wannan shekarar ta 2024. Masu rajin kare muhalli na dora alhakin hakan ga ƙsashen dake da albarkatun mai. Wakilin BBC ya ce an samu mabambantan ra'ayoyin kan hanyar da za a shawo kan matsar, inda wasu ke ganin a taƙaita samar da robobi da leda yayin da wasu ke ganin a hana ma'aikatun amfani da wasu sinadarai.
English translation: International delegates are meeting in Canada for the fourth time to tackle the problem of plastic and plastic pollution. At the 2021 meeting, the countries agreed to reach an agreement by the end of 2024. Dora's parents are responsible for this. According to the BBC, there has been a variety of ideas on how to tackle the problem, with some seeing plastics and plastic products being softened, while others see the use of chemicals banned.

Source: చెల్లిని వేధిస్తున్న అన్న జగన్ ఇలాంటి వ్యక్తిని సైకో కాక ఇంకేమనాలి అంటూ ప్రశ్నించారు. ఎవరైనా తోబుట్టువులు కష్టాల్లో ఉంటే ఆదుకుంటారని, కానీ జగన్ తన పార్టీని కాపాడడం కోసం పాదయాత్ర చేసి అండగా ఉన్న చెల్లి షర్మిలను వేధిస్తున్నారని, ఆమెకే అప్పులు ఇచ్చాడని, ఇంతకన్నా సైకో కి ఇంకేం ఉదాహరణ కావాలంటూ ప్రశ్నించారు. చెల్లికే అప్పిచ్చి వడ్డీ వ్యాపారం చేస్తున్న జగన్ వాస్తవంగా షర్మిల తన తండ్రి ఆస్తిలో వాటా కోరారని, అదేమీ జగన్ సంపాదించిన ఆస్తి కాదన్న చంద్రబాబు, అది వైయస్ రాజశేఖర్ రెడ్డి కూడబెట్టిన ఆస్తి, అందులో షర్మిలకు వాటా ఉందని ఆమెనే చెప్పారన్నారు. కానీ ఈ సైకో ఆస్తిలో వాటా ఇవ్వకుండా చెల్లితోనే వడ్డీవ్యాపారం చేస్తున్నాడని చంద్రబాబు విమర్శించారు. సొంత చెల్లెలికి న్యాయం చేయలేని జగన్ ప్రజలకు ఏం న్యాయం చేస్తాడో మీరే తేల్చుకోవాలి అంటూ చంద్రబాబు పేర్కొన్నారు.
English translation: Jagan, who is harassing his sister, asked if such a person should be called anything other than a psycho. "If any sibling is in trouble, he will help, but Jagan is harassing his sister Sharmila, who is on a padayatra to save his party, and he has given loans to her. Jagan, who is doing interest business by giving money to his sister, actually asked sharmila for a share in his father's property and it is not the property acquired by Jagan, chandrababu said that it was the property accumulated by YS Rajasekhar Reddy and sharmila had a stake in it. But Chandrababu criticized that this psycho is not giving a share in the property and is doing the money lending business with his sister. Chandrababu said that jagan, who cannot do justice to his own sister, should decide what justice he will do to the people.

Source:
欧美的指控
“美国将不会接受新兴产业如同10年前美国钢铁领域那样，被获得补贴的中国廉价进口产品大批摧毁。”耶伦不久前在访华时表示，此行重点是针对中国电动汽车、太阳能电池板和其他清洁能源产品产能过剩的问题，与中国政府沟通，这些问题对美国和其他国家的生产商构成了威胁。
她也解释了背后的逻辑，对于新能源汽车等产业大力支持，产能大幅攀升，而中国国内需求疲弱，因此行业出现过度投资，商品价格被人为压低，当这些产品出口到欧美，当地企业的生存将陷入困境，如同十多年前，中国钢铁席卷全球市场一样。而且，“中国今天的经济体量太大了，中国主体采取的行动可以改变国际价格，可能让美国和其他国家公司的生存成为问题。”
English translation:
Accusations from Europe and the United States
"The U.S. will not accept that new industries will be destroyed by subsidized cheap Chinese imports, as it did in the U.S. steel sector 10 years ago. During a recent visit to China, Yellen said the trip focused on communicating with the Chinese government on overcapacity of electric vehicles, solar panels and other clean energy products in China, which poses a threat to producers in the United States and other countries.
She also explained the logic behind the strong support for industries such as new energy vehicles, production capacity has risen sharply, and China's domestic demand is weak, so the industry is over-invested, commodity prices are artificially depressed, and when these products are exported to Europe and the United States, the survival of local companies will be in trouble, just as more than a decade ago, when Chinese steel swept the global market. Moreover, "China's economy today is so large that actions taken by Chinese actors can change international prices and could make the survival of U.S. and other companies in question."

Source: Lo avevano colpito a calci e pugni per rapinarlo dell'orologio da 50mila euro. La polizia ha arrestato tre giovani per l'episodio del 8 marzo avvenuto in via Paolo da Cannobbio, in centro a Milano, ai danni del titolare 59enne di una tabaccheria. I poliziotti della squadra mobile della questura meneghina hanno ricostruito come la vittima davanti al proprio esercizio commerciale era stato raggiunto da tre giovani che lo avevano aggredito con calci e pugni al volto, facendolo rovinare con violenza al suolo. I tre avevano continuato a colpirlo con calci al viso e, contestualmente, gli avevano strappato dal polso un orologio di marca Rolex modello Daytona, del valore di circa 50mila euro. Il 59enne, a seguito dell'aggressione, era stato trasportato al Policlinico di Milano, dove gli era stato diagnosticato un trauma cranico-faciale e fratture multiple al viso, con una prima prognosi di 30 giorni. Le indagini congiunte degli investigatori della terza sezione con i colleghi della quinta, coordinati dalla procura, hanno portato all'identificazione dei presunti autori da alcuni importanti dettagli nella fisionomia e nell'abbigliamento. Gli arrestati sarebbero "trasfertisti" in quanto tutti e tre dimoranti nella provincia di Bergamo. Nel video le immagini del pestaggio e della fuga dei tre.
English translation: They had kicked and punched him to rob him of the 50,000 euro watch. The police arrested three young people for the episode on 8 March which occurred in via Paolo da Cannobbio, in the center of Milan, against the 59-year-old owner of a tobacco shop The policemen from the Milan police headquarters' mobile squad reconstructed how the victim had been attacked by three young men in front of his business who had attacked him with kicks and punches in the face, causing him to fall violently to the ground kicked in the face and, at the same time, they had ripped off his wrist a Rolex Daytona model watch, worth around 50 thousand euros. Following the attack, the 59-year-old was transported to the Milan Polyclinic, where he was diagnosed with a disease. cranial-facial trauma and multiple facial fractures, with an initial prognosis of 30 days. The joint investigations of the investigators of the third section with colleagues of the fifth, coordinated by the prosecutor's office, led to the identification of the alleged perpetrators from some important details in the physiognomy. and in clothing. Those arrested would be "travellers" as all three lived in the province of Bergamo. The video shows the images of the beating and the escape of the three.

Source: Fem kavalerihester løp løpsk i Londons gater onsdag morgen etter å ha kastet av eierne. Ifølge Telegraph tilhører hestene Household Cavalery og skal ha vært på vei til sin daglige treningstur da de stakk av. Videoer på X viser en hvit og en svart hest som galopperer gjennom Londons gater. Den hvite hesten ser svært blodig ut. Andre bilder viser en soldat som ligger på bakken og får behandling utenfor Clermont Hotel ved Victoria. Hestene skal ha blittsett i store deler av London sentrum. De skal ha kommet seg fra Westminster i vest og helt til Tower Bridge i øst. Bilder viser også at minst en av hestene skal ha kollidert med en parkert buss.
English translation: Five cavalry horses ran wild in the streets of London on Wednesday morning after throwing off their owners. According to the Telegraph, the horses belong to the Household Cavalery and were reportedly on their way to their daily training ride when they ran away. Videos on X show a white and a black horse galloping through the streets of London. The white horse looks very bloody. Other images show a soldier lying on the ground receiving treatment outside the Clermont Hotel near Victoria. The horses are said to have been seen in much of central London. They are said to have made their way from Westminster in the west all the way to Tower Bridge in the east. Photos also show that at least one of the horses reportedly collided with a parked bus.

Source: D'Emma Sorgato hat d'Halleffinall vun der belscher Talentshow iwwerstanen a stoung en Dënschdeg den Owend an der Finall, déi vun RTBF iwwerdroe gouf. An der Halleffinall stoung déi 20 Joer jonk Lëtzebuergerin mat hirer Performance vum Roy-Orbison-Lidd "Pretty Woman" op der Bün a konnt de Public iwwerzeegen. En Dënschdeg den Owend war et d'Emma Sorgato vu Fluesweiler du fir d'Finall de Retour op d'Bün vun "The Voice Belgium". Als éischten Titel huet si "Aimée Pour De Vrai" gewielt, dee si zesumme mat der Héléna Bailly vun der Star Academy 2023 virgedroen huet. Als zweet Lidd huet d'Emma Sorgato ee Mashup vun den zwee Eurythmics-Titelen "Here Comes The Rain Again" an "Sweet Dreams" gesongen. Mat zwee staarken Optrëtter konnt d'Lëtzebuergerin sech géint hir Konkurrenten Alexandre a Clément duerchsetzen. Mat der Sängerin Alyah ass si no engem éischte Vott an déi lescht Etapp vun der Finall agezunn.
English translation: Emma Sorgato had survived the semi-finals of the Belgian talent show and was in the final on Tuesday evening, which was broadcast by RTBF. In the semi-final, the 20-year-old Luxembourger stood on stage with her performance of the Roy Orbison song "Pretty Woman" and was able to convince the public. On Tuesday evening it was Emma Sorgato from Fluesweiler who returned to the stage of "The Voice Belgium" for the final. As her first title, she chose "Aimée Pour De Vrai", which she presented together with Héléna Bailly from Star Academy 2023. As the second song, Emma Sorgato sang a mashup of the two Eurythmics titles "Here Comes The Rain Again" and "Sweet Dreams". With two strong performances, the Luxembourger was able to prevail against her competitors Alexandre and Clément. With the singer Alyah, she entered the last stage of the final after a first vote.

English translation:
Bhubaneswar, 24.4: Trahi was not found in Tati. The summer flow will continue for 5 days. Especially on 27th and 28th, entire Odisha will be lit. The Meteorological Department has issued a warning about severe heatwave in the state. A warning has been issued regarding severe heat wave for the next three days. The department said that the number of cases in the state could rise to 45.

Bhubaneswar is considered as the hottest city by 2:30. Bhubaneswar recorded a temperature of 43.2 degrees today. Similarly, Jharsuguda 42.9 degrees, Chandbali 42.2 degrees, Balasore 41.4 degrees.

Source:
Schneeschusaison im Arzgebirg ze End

Des Schneeschuhzeit is im Arzgebirg itze erscht emol vorbei. Wie dor Tourismusverband mitteelte wurde dor Schiebetrieb wechn dor milden Tempeaturn und des vieln Reschens ieberall eigestellt.

Nach Angaben dor Liftgesellschaft in O-thal gobs heier vieresiebzsch Toche zen Ruscheln uffn Fichtelbarch. In guten Garn warns Ehunnertdreizsch Toch. In dor Schiearena Eimstock hotn se Anesiebzsch Toch ze tun. Un in Altenberch Fimfefuffzsch. Frieher warns dort emol Achtzsch Toch gewasn.
English translation:
Snowshoe season in the Ore Mountains is over

Snowshoe season is now over in the Ore Mountains. According to the tourism association, skiing was stopped everywhere because of the mild temperatures and the heavy rain.

According to information from the lift company in Oberwiesenthal, there were seventy-four days of skiing on the Fichtelberg. In good years, it was hunderd and thirty days. They were open for seventy-one days in the Eibenstock Ski Arena. And in Altenberg fifty-five. This used to be eighty days earlier.

Source:
Niegdyś prężne ośrodki lokalnego przemysłu, polskie mniejsze miasta okazały się niedostrzeganą ofiarą gwałtownych zmian systemowych wprowadzonych po upadku komunizmu w 1989 roku.

Miasta i miasteczka te bowiem żyły i umierały wraz z lokalnymi przedsiębiorstwami państwowymi, które w latach 90. w wielu przypadkach znalazły się w rękach menedżerów, którym trudno było dostosować je do wolnorynkowej rzeczywistości, a prostszym rozwiązaniem było sprzedanie ich na części.

Gdy fabryki zaczęły upadać jedna po drugiej, mieszkańcy miast znaleźli się bez pracy, a później nawet bez niektórych kluczowych usług publicznych.
English translation:
Once thriving centres of local industry, small Polish towns became overlooked victims of the rapid changes introduced after the fall of communism in 1989.

These places lived and died with local state-owned enterprises, which in the 1990s, in many cases, found themselves in the hands of managers who found it difficult to adapt the companies to the free market reality, often opting for the simpler solution of selling them for parts.

As the factories began to collapse one by one, residents of the towns found themselves without jobs and later even without some vital public services.
If original, then MT::
Once thriving centers of local industry, Polish smaller towns turned out to be unnoticed victims of the rapid systemic changes introduced after the fall of communism in 1989.

These cities and towns lived and died with local state-owned enterprises, which in the 1990s in many cases found themselves in the hands of managers who found it difficult to adapt them to the free market reality, and the simpler solution was to sell them for parts.

As factories began to fail one by one, city dwellers found themselves without jobs and, later, even without some key public services.

Source:
כאָטש הײַנט איז פּאָרטוגאַל נאָר אַ קלײן אייראָפּעיִש לאַנד, איז עס אַ מאָל געווען איינס פֿון די גרעסטע ים־אימפּעריעס אויף דער וועלט. די באַקאַנטסטע געוועזענע קאָלאָניע פֿון פּאָרטוגאַל איז בראַזיל. אין אַפֿריקע געפֿינען זיך אויך אַ סך לענדער, וווּ מען רעדט ביז הײַנט פּאָרטוגעזיש: אַנגאָלאַ, מאָזאַמביק, קאַבו־ווערדי, גינע־ביסאַו, סאַו־טאָמע און פּרינסיפּי.

פֿונדעסטוועגן ווײסן ווײניק מענטשן אַז פּאָרטוגאַל האָט אויך קאָנטראָלירט אַ סך פּאָרט־שטעט אין אַזיאַטישע לענדער. כּמעט אין יעדן אָרט, וואָס איז אַ מאָל געווען אַ טײל פֿון דער פּאָרטוגעזישער אימפּעריע, געפֿינט מען קלײנע און זײער אינטערעסאַנטע עטנישע גרופּעס פֿון געמישטן אָפּשטאַם אַזאַ ווי די מאַקאַנעזער אין מאַקאַו, כינע, און די קריסטאַנגען אין סינגאַפּור און מאַלײַזיע.
English translation:
Today, Portugal is only a small European country, but it used to be one of the world’s largest and longest-lived maritime empires. The most well-known of its former colonies is Brazil. Many African countries, too, speak Portuguese to this day as a colonial legacy: Angola, Mozambique, Cape Verde, Guinea-Bissau, São Tomé and Príncipe.

However, few people know that aside from its South American and African possessions, Portugal once controlled many port cities throughout Asia. Almost every area that used to be part of the Portuguese Empire is home to small ethnic groups of mixed heritage such as the Macanese in Macau, China, and the Kristang people in Singapore and Malaysia.
If original, then MT::
Although today Portugal is only a small European country, it was once one of the largest maritime empires in the world. The most famous former colony of Portugal is Brazil. There are also many countries in Africa where Portuguese is still spoken today: Angola, Mozambique, Cabo Verde, Guinea-Bissau, Sao Tome and Principe.

However, few people know that Portugal also controlled many port cities in Asian countries. In almost every place that was once part of the Portuguese Empire, there are small and very interesting ethnic groups of mixed origin, such as the Macanese in Macau, China, and the Christians in Singapore and Malaysia.

Source: מצוקת הדיור מובילה רבים לפתרונות יצירתיים, לאו דווקא חוקיים: בדרום תל אביב, למשל, כבר מספר שנים ישנה תופעה שבמסגרתה חנויות הופכות לדירות מגורים, אך לאחרונה התופעה הזאת תפסה תאוצה. באזור פלורנטין בואכה מבואות יפו קיימים רחובות מסחריים רבים שבעבר היו מלאים בחנויות - וכיום משמשים למגורים בלבד עם ויטרינות חסומות בבלוקים ודלתות מאולתרות.
English translation: The housing crisis leads many to creative, not necessarily legal, solutions: in South Tel Aviv, for example, for several years there has been a phenomenon in which shops are converted into residential apartments, but recently this phenomenon has gained momentum. In the Florentine area at the entrance to Jaffa there are many commercial streets that used to be full of shops - and today are used only for residences with storefronts blocked with blocks and makeshift doors.
